pageContent: Objective: To investigate the efficacy and safety of extracorporeal prostatic tissue ablation using high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) in vivo in animals, and in a clinical feasibility study in men, as this is an investigational minimally invasive treatment alternative for locally confined prostatic carcinoma, but may have significant side-effects.

metaData.source:
Pathological Findings and Magnetic Resonance Imaging Concordance at Salvage Radical Prostatectomy for Local Recurrence following Partial Ablation Using High Intensity Focused Ultrasound
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30730409/
